text: The Finnish League Cup was a knock-out football competition contested annually during the pre-season in winter by teams from Veikkausliiga. http://www.rsssf.com/tablesf/finleagcuphist.html The league cup was abolished after the 2016 tournament and replaced with the Finnish Cup group stage starting from the 2017 season. http://yle.fi/urheilu/3-8904879 ==Finnish League Cup Finals== {|
